thread.title: Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday
thread.title_full: Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday

author: USA TODAY
title: Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday
text:
Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday Readers react to President Obama’s commutation of Chelsea Manning. Post to Facebook Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday Readers react to President Obama’s commutation of Chelsea Manning.  //usat.ly/2jAibhn   Join the Nation's Conversation   Don’t cry over Russia hack, if you let traitors go: #tellusatoday USA TODAY 4:51 p.m. ET Jan. 18, 2017 Readers react to President Obama’s commutation of Chelsea Manning. Chelsea Manning (formerly known as Bradley Manning) leaving a military court facility on July 30, 2013. (Photo: Saul Loeb, AFP/Getty Images) 1 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Letter to the editor: 
President Obama commuted Chelsea Manning’s sentence on Tuesday. 
I’m having a problem with liberals, Democrats and Obama being concerned about potential hacking by Russia, when we now know that a person who disclosed classified documents gets her sentence commuted. 
It says a lot about the fake outrage over a potential hacking, when our president commutes a soldier’s treasonous activity. 
Barry Levy; Hawthorne, Calif. 
Facebook comments are edited for clarity and grammar: 
Shocker. President Obama commuting the sentencing of Chelsea Manning, who released classified information. I just thank God that Obama only has a couple more days. 
— Jackie Gibbs 
Maybe 35 years was too steep of a sentence, but I would not have commuted this sentence to only time served. Had it been up to me, she would have had to serve at least 10 years for her crime. It sends the wrong message. There was information that could have endangered lives in the documents she gave to WikiLeaks. 
— Bradford Talamon 
You’ve got to love the hypocrisy of Obama and Democrats. They cry over Russia releasing confidential emails, but the person who released information to WikiLeaks gets her sentence commuted. But what else do you expect from the president and the Democrats in general? Obama threw the left a bone. Ideology overrules reality with Democrats. 
— Paul Rush
